abstract: Many digital cameras will soon be getting a workout at holiday parties and family gatherings.
snippet: Many digital cameras will soon be getting a workout at holiday parties and family gatherings.
lead_paragraph: Many digital cameras will soon be getting a workout at holiday parties and family gatherings. To extend the life of the battery during these events, turn off the power-hungry LCD screen (press the button on the back for Settings or Display) and compose photos through the optical viewfinder (if it has one) to squeeze out even more festive shots. J. D. BIERSDORFER

headline.main: Tip of the Week: Extending the Life of Digital Cameras

abstract: Relations between Carl C. Icahn and Leon D. Black, the founder of the Apollo Management, may not be at their warmest right now, after Mr. Icahn filed suit against his close friend and fellow billionaire, but The Deal has dug up a video on YouTube that shows how chummy the two deal-makers have been in the past.
lead_paragraph: Relations between Carl C. Icahn and Leon D. Black, the founder of the Apollo Management, may not be at their warmest right now, after Mr. Icahn filed suit against his close friend and fellow billionaire, but The Deal has dug up a video on YouTube that shows how chummy the two deal-makers have been in the past.

headline.main: Icahn and Black: The Early Days
